description:
Through an unexpected turn of events, an ordinary elementary school student, http://anidb.net/ch65720 [Enryuu Hiro], finds himself in the world of the Dragon Collection game. This is a world called Dragon Earth, where gods, humans, and monsters exist side by side. Those who roam this world using a magic book, called a Grimoire, and cards to summon monsters and search for treasures that bear the powers of dragons are called Dracolle Battlers. Despite his bewilderment, Hiro becomes a Dracolle Battler and, together with the friends he meets there, begins his adventure to become a legendary Dragon Master!
Source: Crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
When our protagonist, Hiro, is about to play his first game of DraColle, he is suddenly sucked into the game machine, and wakes up in the game world of Dragon Earth! After a course of events, Hiro rescues a monster called a Drake Puppy, and ends up fighting with the thief Meat-Mania.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: なにこれ!? ドラコレ!

REGULAR.description:
After Hiro barely beats Meat-Mania in battle, a DraColle Battler named Shin appears before him. The two kindred spirits decide to journey together! While visiting Mino Village, Hiro and Shin inadvertently eat at a restaurant when they don’t have money.
Source: crunchyroll

Hiro and Shin splendidly defeat the Nidhogg and receive a warm reception from the village. Next they are asked to escort a group of peddlers from Mino Village to Mysen Town. On the way, Meat-Mania comes attacking.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mata Hitori Hen na no ga Kita!
また1人ヘンなのが来た!

REGULAR.description:
Hiro and Shin safely arrive at Mysen Castle{town?}, and end their escort of the peddlers. While sightseeing around the castle, they meet a girl named Yuna who is being chased by soldiers for stealing a treasure. Moved by her story of stealing the treasure to help her sick parents, Hiro and Shin volunteer to exterminate the Kraken, who possesses the same treasure and haunts the castle floodgates.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: マイセン城のタコ退治!

REGULAR.description:
Shin and Hanicchi help Rei turn around his battle against the Kraken with a little combining! Afterwards, Rei joins Shin and Hiro on their journey, but before they can celebrate with a good meal, a Monster Griffin attacks!
Source: crunchyroll

As our heroes are tied up with vultures circling, Yuna comes to the rescue - though in rather unorthodox fashion. Before long they get another chance to fight Meatmania! Can Hiro summon a Fire Drake this time and truly join in the battle?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akuma de Shitsukoi Shishi Tou Dan!
The Endlessly Pesky Green Pepper Gang!
あくまでしつこいシシトウ団!

REGULAR.description:
Now that Hiro can finally Fire Drake, their feud with Meatmania heads for an explosive end! After getting new cards from the castle`s Monster Dispenser, the three learn that there`s more to the Green Pepper Gang than just Meatmania - and appearances can be deceiving...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ナニダス? モンスダス!

REGULAR.description:
After Rubica leaves our heroes tied up and hanging (again), a villager saves them from an approaching monster. However, this rescue comes at a price: he wants them to exterminate a monster that`s blocking the villagers from their food supply, and keeps the ill Shin behind as collateral. Hurry, guys!
Source: crunchyroll

An encounter with a lone stranger in the desert leads to new adventures for our heroes, including another showdown with Rubica and the Green Pepper Gang!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Looks Like a Traveler in Trouble!
遭難者がいるそうなんです!

REGULAR.description:
After Hiro narrowly escapes death by cliff-fall, our heroes infiltrate the Green Pepper Gang`s stronghold! It all comes down to a three vs. one battle against the big boss Mara, but his single card won`t be easy to beat...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: シシトウ団をぶっつぶせ!

REGULAR.description:
Our heroes arrive in the port town of Calonima, ready to set sail for adventure! Unfortunately, there`s a giant sea monster keeping all ships away from the port! Well, except for Captain Karubora`s ship - seems a little fishy...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Young Master and the Slick Trickster?!

REGULAR.description:
After Captain Karubora is arrested, our heroes are rewarded with his ship. They need a captain to help them sail it, but nobody wants to go to Raniaza Island! Juliet suggests an old friend, but will he accept the job despite a sailing trauma in his past?
Source: crunchyroll

Hiro and friends have set sail for Raniaza Island with Captain Schiff (and Yuna)! But the dreaded Bizarreda Triangle is on the way, and it won`t be that easy to avoid...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 魔のビミョーダ・トライアングル!

REGULAR.description:
Hiro and friends board the ghost ship, only to find it crewed by pirate skeletons who continue to seek treasure even after death!
Source: crunchyroll

Our heroes finally arrive at Raniaza Island, only to find more trouble than treasure!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: キャプテンユートの野望!

REGULAR.description:
After helping the islanders, Hiro and friends are permitted to enter the cave of many treasures! But, they`re going to need help from some familiar faces in order to find them...
Source: crunchyroll

Our heroes leave the treasure cave, only to find something earth-shattering! Later, The Lanche approaches the nearest port town, but they discover that it has been taken over by Pirate Captain Yut. They agree to rescue the mayor and save the townspeople; Yuna offers to help out too, but she may have ulterior motives...
Source: crunchyroll

Our heroes have a tough battle to save Biliora`s mayor and the captured Yuna! However, Shin`s monster isn`t quite up to it. Hanicchi introduces fusion-combining, which makes a monster new as well as improved!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 合体ありえないんですけどぉ~!

REGULAR.description:
With Port Biliora freed, it`s time for our three heroes to begin their overland journey to Dragonia. But as they bid farewell to Captain Schiff and The Lanche, Captain Yut suddenly shows up with Co Uta Mara and a terrifying superweapon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Co Uta Mara Strikes Back Big-Time!
コ・ウタ・マーラの大逆襲!

REGULAR.description:
After a successful test fire, Captain Yut feeds the Arcannon to make it powerful enough to destroy Port Biliora! Can our heroes on the Lanche stop him before it`s too late?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: さらば, ランシェ号!

REGULAR.description:
With just one day`s walk left to get to Ohto, Hiro and friends run into a couple of strange characters, and learn about the Dragonia Battler Tournament soon to take place.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: おおっと, 王都に着いちゃった!

REGULAR.description:
A hostile being challenges Hiro and friends, revealing the existence of a mysterious dark grimoire...
Source: crunchyroll

Upon entering the Dragonia Battle Tournament, Hiro and friends face familiar enemies - and a most unexpected challenge!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ドラゴニアバトルトーナメント!

REGULAR.description:
Hiro and Shin advance to Round Two of the tournament for some real DraColle Battles! How will Hiro fare against the certain winner, Chiffon? And how will Rei`s wounded pride cope with missing the first quiz question?
Source: crunchyroll

We see the end of Shin`s battle against Rubica, and the start of Dragonia Battle Tournament Round 3! Meanwhile, there are some suspicious goings-on in the castle...
Source: crunchyroll

During his tough battle with Gelmen, Shin discovers a hidden strength! Meanwhile, Hiro`s up against the powerful and mysterious Masked Battler! Who is that guy, anyway?
Source: crunchyroll

First, reformed vegetarian Meatmania fights creepy Marmott! Then, during the leadup to Hiro and Shin`s semifinal battle, Yuna uncovers a sinister conspiracy...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 燃えろ! ミートマニア!

REGULAR.description:
It`s time for friends Hiro and Shin to battle in the semifinals! But, how can Hiro`s Blaze Fighter stand a chance against Shin`s newly-evolved Forest Warrior?
Source: crunchyroll

For the final round of the tournament, Hiro faces a ferocious battle against the cruel Marmott! Meanwhile, the others trace the mysterious jar to an unexpected location.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fierce Fight! The Flame-Filled Final Round!
激闘! 炎の決勝バトル!

REGULAR.description:
Hiro is exhausted and down to one monster against Marmott`s three! Meanwhile, Arcally is about to summon something terrifying in the Jimanpa forest! Will this episode bring us triumph, or tragedy?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: This Is Bad! Rebirth of the Evil God?!
ヤバコレ! 邪神復活!?

REGULAR.description:
After leaving the Kingdom of Dragonia, the three boys and Yuna discover some mysterious clues that the world is in great peril.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 3つの祭壇? 謎のメッセージ!
Mittsu no Saidan? Nazo no Message!

REGULAR.description:
While crossing an immense field of grass on the way to the three altars, our heroes run into a tough-talking opponent! Papi, completely fed up with how Hiro won`t summon him to battle anymore, sneaks away during the excitement. Can Hiro re-find his first friend, after taking him for granted?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ぷんすか! プンスカ! パピ!

REGULAR.description:
The gang follow Papi`s tracks across the desert, but they lead to Aebima and his well-defined musculature instead!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: キレてます! サイドチェスト!?

REGULAR.description:
Yuna uses her vast treasure-hunting experience to lead the party safely past numerous traps inside the pyramid. Deep within, they discover... an altar, maybe? But how will they ever find its key?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ビックリ! これが鍵!?

REGULAR.description:
After successfully defeating the ghost that tried to scare them away from the Wangae Forest, the party gets a surprise visitor: Shin`s mother!
Source: crunchyroll

The gang arrives at a castle hidden in the forest, where Shin says the Forest Altar lies. However, the crafty witch Mansa follows them there, with a cunning plan to nab the altar key. Can our heroes outwit her?
Source: crunchyroll

Rei boldly leads the gang to the Water Altar — even though he has no idea where it is...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Naze Wagahei Dake Pin to Konai no Da!?
Why Don`t I Get a Hunch?!
なぜ吾輩だけピンと来ないのだ!?

REGULAR.description:
Our heroes manage to enter the Undersea Temple, but Kageiso isn`t going to let them reach the Water Altar without a fight...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Battle at the Undersea Temple!

REGULAR.description:
Yuna finally comes clean on the reason for her obsessive treasure hunting!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 激白! ユナのヒ・ミ・ツ!

REGULAR.description:
As our heroes try to determine where the Papis have been taken, Arcally`s group advances their evil scheme.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ドコソレ? タルタロスの門!

REGULAR.description:
Dastardly pirate Captain Yut has approached The Lanche! He can`t be up to anything good, can he?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 教えて! ナスターシャ!

REGULAR.description:
Old friends and former enemies join forces with our heroes to battle Co Uta Mara`s gang on the Dragon Wing coast!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ryuu no Tsubasa wa Moete Iruka!?
竜の翼は燃えているか!?

REGULAR.description:
After leaving the fight at the seashore, Hiro`s group must pass through a dense forest to reach the Tartarus Gate! Meanwhile, Captain Yut has a sinking feeling during his own battle...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 発進! ダークスカル号!

REGULAR.description:
Hiro and friends have left the forest, only to be ambushed by the Arrabbiata Gang! Can they withstand the monster-obliterating power of Jean`s Guts Bomber?!
Source: crunchyroll

Out to rescue Papi and stop Arcally`s ritual, Hiro and friends have nearly reached the summit of Mt. Happou! But that pesky Marmott`s in their way, demanding another showdown!
Source: crunchyroll

The Tartarus Gate has begun to open, releasing the Evil God! What`s going to happen to Dragon Earth?!
Source: crunchyroll

The Evil God has appeared! Co Uta Mara has summoned nine monsters to defeat and make our heroes` monsters sacrifices to the Evil God! How can Hiro and friends withstand such overwhelming power?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ガクブル! 壮絶バトル!

REGULAR.description:
The Platinum Drake and Drake Lucifer clash atop Mt. Happou, as the Evil God looks on. Is there anything our heroes can do to improve the situation?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 邪悪! 最凶ドラゴン!

REGULAR.description:
Rei reveals his first-class idea. Will it be enough to revive the Chaos God Drake and defeat the Evil God?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Advent of the Chaos God Drake!
光臨! カオスゴッド・ドレイク!

REGULAR.description:
In order for the Chaos God Drake to defeat the Evil God, the world needs a Dragon Master! Will Hiro be up to the task?
Source: crunchyroll

So long as DraColle exists, I, Naviko, will practice the way of commentary!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ガッツだぜ! ミートマニア!

WIKIPEDIA_JP: ドラゴンコレクション

titles.title: ドラゴンコレクション
